title: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description:
The bug report is about the Modify Parameters dialog. The reported issues are as follows:

a. The buttons are too small.

b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled.

c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.

g. The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.

The suggested improvements are:

- The marking between the button and the list is too large.

- The top button should be aligned with the dialog top.

c. The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic.

d. Multiple selection should be allowed, as Move Up / Move Down can be applied on more than one item.

f. The signature preview must be a label that wraps.

It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover.

h.
OB:
1. The buttons in the Modify Parameters dialog are too small.

2. When the dialog opens, no table entry is initially selected. However, both move buttons (Move Up and Move Down) are enabled.

3. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview for the modified name is cut off.

4. The Modify Parameters dialog appears oversized for methods with many parameters.
EB:
1. The spacing between the button and the list should be reduced. The top button should be aligned with the top of the dialog.

2. The table in the Modify Parameters dialog should have a label so that it can support a mnemonic.

3. Multiple selection should be allowed in the table, as the Move Up and Move Down actions can be applied to more than one item.

4. The signature preview in the dialog should be a label that wraps the text.

5. It would be helpful if the signature preview had the same background color as a hover.

6.
